sentences: Wolfgang Puschnig (born 21 May 1956 in Klagenfurt, Austria) is an Austrian jazz musician (saxophone, flute, bass clarinet) and composer.
He also played with Hans Koller in the early 1980s, with the quartet 'Air Mail' and 'Saxofour'.
Carla Bley brought him into her groups in the mid 1980s.
In the project "Alpine Aspects" he started in 1991 with jazz musicians and the Amstetten musicians together (most recently at the JazzFest Berlin  2006 and at Musikfest Waidhofen / Thaya 2007).
